member.name: D2D1_SEPIA_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for properties of the Sepia effect.

member.name: D2D1_SEPIA_PROP.D2D1_SEPIA_PROP_INTENSITY
member.summary: The D2D1_SEPIA_PROP_INTENSITY property is a float value indicating the intensity of the sepia effect. The allowed range is 0.0 to 1.0. The default value is 0.5.

member.name: D2D1_SEPIA_PROP.D2D1_SEPIA_PROP_ALPHA_MODE
member.summary:
The D2D1_SEPIA_PROP_ALPHA_MODE property is a enumeration value indicating the alpha mode of the input file. See the About Alpha Modes section of the Supported Pixel Formats and Alpha Modes topic for additional information..
The default value is D2D1_ALPHA_MODE_PREMULTIPLIED.
